title: Dell Labor Day sale 2021: the best deals on laptops, monitors and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: The Dell Labor Day sale is live - see today's best deals
article: The Dell Labor Day sale is live with incredible deals on its bestselling laptops, including the XPS 13, Inspiron, Alienware, and more. You can score massive savings on a range of laptops and monitors, with prices starting at just $249.99.

Some of Dell's best Labor Day deals include the budget Inspiron 15 3000 on sale for just $293.99, a massive $273 discount on the powerful XPS 13 laptop, and the Alienware m15 R6 gaming machine marked down to $1,299.99 (was $1,479.99). Dell's Labor Day sale isn't just about laptops, you can also get the Dell 24-inch monitor marked down to $149.99 (was $219.99), and this 27-inch monitor on sale for a record-low price of $249.99 (was $399.99). See more of the best Labor Day deals from Dell's sale below, and if you're interested in more bargains, you can see our guide to the best Labor Day sales from retailers like Best Buy, Home Depot, and Lowe's.

See more laptop sales with the best cheap laptop deals and the best cheap Dell laptop deals and prices. You can also see more bargains with our roundup of the best Labor Day laptop deals and the best Labor Day TV sales.

headers.2: Dell Labor Day sale: today's best deals
